name: NSLayoutConstraint.FormatOptions
desc: A bit mask that specifies both a part of an interface element to align and a direction for the alignment between two interface elements.

items.name: static var alignAllLeft: NSLayoutConstraint.FormatOptions
items.desc: Align all specified interface elements using NSLayoutConstraint.Attribute.left on each.

items.name: static var alignAllRight: NSLayoutConstraint.FormatOptions
items.desc: Align all specified interface elements using NSLayoutConstraint.Attribute.right on each.

items.name: static var alignAllTop: NSLayoutConstraint.FormatOptions
items.desc: Align all specified interface elements using NSLayoutConstraint.Attribute.top on each.

items.name: static var alignAllBottom: NSLayoutConstraint.FormatOptions
items.desc: Align all specified interface elements using NSLayoutConstraint.Attribute.bottom on each.

items.name: static var alignAllLeading: NSLayoutConstraint.FormatOptions
items.desc: Align all specified interface elements using NSLayoutConstraint.Attribute.leading on each.

items.name: static var alignAllTrailing: NSLayoutConstraint.FormatOptions
items.desc: Align all specified interface elements using NSLayoutConstraint.Attribute.trailing on each.

items.name: static var alignAllCenterX: NSLayoutConstraint.FormatOptions
items.desc: Align all specified interface elements using NSLayoutConstraint.Attribute.centerX on each.

items.name: static var alignAllCenterY: NSLayoutConstraint.FormatOptions
items.desc: Align all specified interface elements using NSLayoutConstraint.Attribute.centerY on each.

items.name: static var alignAllLastBaseline: NSLayoutConstraint.FormatOptions
items.desc: Align all specified interface elements using the last baseline of each one.

items.name: static var alignAllFirstBaseline: NSLayoutConstraint.FormatOptions
items.desc: Align all specified interface elements using the first baseline of each one.

items.name: static var alignmentMask: NSLayoutConstraint.FormatOptions
items.desc: Bit mask that can be combined with a NSLayoutConstraint.FormatOptions variable to yield only the alignment portion of the format options.

items.name: static var directionLeadingToTrailing: NSLayoutConstraint.FormatOptions
items.desc: Arrange objects in order based on the normal text flow for the current user interface language. In left-to-right languages (like English), this arrangement results in the first object being placed farthest to the left, the next one to its right, and so on. In right-to-left languages (like Arabic or Hebrew), the ordering is reversed.

items.name: static var directionLeftToRight: NSLayoutConstraint.FormatOptions
items.desc: Arrange objects in order from left to right.

items.name: static var directionRightToLeft: NSLayoutConstraint.FormatOptions
items.desc: Arrange objects in order from right to left.

items.name: static var directionMask: NSLayoutConstraint.FormatOptions
items.desc: A bit mask that can be combined with an NSLayoutConstraint.FormatOptions variable to yield only the direction portion of the format options.

items.name: static var spacingBaselineToBaseline: NSLayoutConstraint.FormatOptions
items.desc: Align elements vertically according to their baseline positions.

items.name: static var spacingMask: NSLayoutConstraint.FormatOptions
items.desc: A bit mask that can be combined with an NSLayoutConstraint.FormatOptions variable to yield only the spacing baseline spacing portion of the format options.
